00098     public function addUserAction( $accessLevel, $action )
00099     {
00100         $_map = PS::o( $this->_userActionMap, $accessLevel, array() );
00101 
00102         if ( ! in_array( $action, $_map ) )
00103             array_push( $_map, $action );
00104 
00105         //  Make sure we don't lose our error handler...
00106         if ( self::ACCESS_TO_ANY == $accessLevel )
00107         {
00108             if ( ! in_array( 'error', $_map ) )
00109                 array_push( $_map, 'error' );
00110         }
00111         
00112         return $this->setUserActionMap( $accessLevel, $_map );
00113     }
00114 
00119     public function addUserActions( $accessLevel, $actions = array() )
00120     {
00121         foreach ( $actions as $_action ) 
00122             $this->addUserAction( $accessLevel, $_action );
00123         
00124         return $this->getOwner();
